channel.title: Items
channel.description: Hi, this is kinda a noob question I'm really new at this, how do you customize specific items, for example give an item unique options such as teleport you somewhere, or maybe make ring of kinship start a dungeon or something?

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“lulza4, post:3, topic:526030”][quote author=4x4Chevrolet link=topic=644775.msg4338155#msg4338155 date=1374713170]
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Start reading. You’ll figure it out.
[/quote]
Thanks man. I always thought java was just an island.

Anybody else? I’m sure this is easy I looked through most of the src files and stuff and can’t seem to find any place/file controlling customized items.[/quote]
Because there is none. Check this out:
http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Item_action_1

Read full topic
